name: Bulbasaur
description: Bulbasaur is a small, squat amphibian and plant Pokémon. It has a blue-green body with dark green spots and a green plant bulb on its back.

name: Charmander
description: Charmander is a small, bipedal, dinosaur-like Pokémon with a primarily orange body. It has a flame that is constantly burning on the end of its tail.

name: Squirtle
description: Squirtle is a turtle-like Pokémon with large eyes and chubby cheeks. Its skin is light blue, and it has a long, curled tail and a shell on its back.

name: Chikorita
description: Chikorita is a small, pale-green, quadrupedal Pokémon with dark-green buds around its neck. On top of its head is a large, green leaf.

name: Cyndaquil
description: Cyndaquil is a small, bipedal mammalian Pokémon with a long, thin snout and bluish fur. It has flames on its back that look like spines.

name: Totodile
description: Totodile is a bipedal, crocodilian Pokémon with well-developed jaws. Down its back is a row of three red spines with a small, red ridge on either side.

name: Treecko
description: Treecko is a small, green, bipedal reptilian Pokémon. It has yellow eyes with long, narrow pupils. Treecko's hands and feet are covered with tiny spikes.

name: Torchic
description: Torchic is a small, chick Pokémon with stubby, downy, yellow wings. There is an orange and yellow crest on its head that resembles a flame.

name: Mudkip
description: Mudkip is a small, amphibious, quadrupedal Pokémon. It has a blue body with a fin on its head and tail and star-shaped gills on its cheeks.

name: Turtwig
description: Turtwig is a small, turtle-like quadrupedal Pokémon. It is primarily light green with yellow eyes, feet, and lower jaw, and it has a brown shell made of earth.

name: Chimchar
description: Chimchar is a bipedal Pokémon resembling a chimpanzee. Its fur is primarily orange, although its face, outer ears, underbelly, hands, and feet are light yellow.

name: Piplup
description: Piplup is a light-blue, penguin-like Pokémon. It has a dark blue head and feathers with a primarily white face and a short, yellow beak.
